column4: how many ubuntu xchat rooms are there? this can't be the only one out there, right?
Xchat is just one of many IRC clients: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_Relay_Chat
You'll most likely need a LiveCD/USB/ rescue floppy.
If it's a recent enough version to support ext4, yes.
First run boot info script as explained here and pastebin the output: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1291280
What do you mean "no such file or downloads"?
The terminal is case sensitive, that's "Downloads" not "downloads".
What is the exact command you ran?
Follow the directions non that page, don't skip over anything.

It looks like you tried to re-install grub without following all of the steps, follow this guide *exactly*, asking questions if there is anthing you don't understand, and you should be fine: http://grub.enbug.org/Grub2LiveCdInstallGuide
Just follow that guide and everything will work.
